channel.title: MoparScape's Webclient
channel.description:
Long ago..i used moparscape as a noob friendly server+source(hybridscape) to run a server since i didnt know nothing.. now when i went into the shops.cfg in the source. i edited bobs shop to be a Dragon Armor/Weapon Shop. but i failed. then i saved. i logged in the server again. error connecting to server.
THIS IS WHAT THE CMD SAID UNDER THE WEBCLIENT: [07:41:02] Starting MoparScape 3.2 [07:41:03] [07:41:03] News: Welcome to MoparScape 3.2, the pinnacle of RS2 [07:41:03] News: first generation client editing, with a built [07:41:03] News: in private server, music player capable of playing [07:41:03] News: both midis and mp3s, item/object/npc changer/viewer and [07:41:03] News: much much more. For updates, suggestions, or help [07:41:03] News: please visit the forums at www.moparisthebest.com/smf [07:41:03] News: and post in my thread. Y'all have fun. [07:41:03] News: [07:41:03] News: For online servers, look at the [07:41:03] News: server status list at moparisthebest.com [07:41:03] News: [07:41:03] News: -moparisthebest [07:41:03] Server : :43594 Error: loaderror bobStarting up 20
Then after 2 days i deleted the client+server and even the webclient didnt respond. Now i can never use moparscape again.

item.title: MoparScape's Webclient
item.dc:creator: @killer117 killer117
item.description:
@killer117 wrote:

Try deleting your moparscape cache? -All I can think of…

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape's Webclient
item.dc:creator: @adventurescape adventurescape
item.description:
@adventurescape wrote:

Long ago…i used moparscape as a noob friendly server+source(hybridscape) to run a server since i didnt know nothing… now when i went into the shops.cfg in the source. i edited bobs shop to be a Dragon Armor/Weapon Shop. but i failed. then i saved. i logged in the server again. error connecting to server.

THIS IS WHAT THE CMD SAID UNDER THE WEBCLIENT:
[07:41:02] Starting MoparScape 3.2
[07:41:03]
[07:41:03] News: Welcome to MoparScape 3.2, the pinnacle of RS2
[07:41:03] News: first generation client editing, with a built
[07:41:03] News: in private server, music player capable of playing
[07:41:03] News: both midis and mp3s, item/object/npc changer/viewer and
[07:41:03] News: much much more. For updates, suggestions, or help

[07:41:03] News: and post in my thread. Y’all have fun.

Error: loaderror bobStarting up 20

Then after 2 days i deleted the client+server and even the webclient didnt respond.
Now i can never use moparscape again.
